sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STEREOMETRY, Σ τεϑεομετϑια, formed of οτεϑος, solid, and μετϑοv, measure, that part of geometry which teaches how to measure solid bodies, s. e. to find the solidity or solid contents of bodies ; as globes, cylinders, cubes, vessels, ships, &c.
